title: New: Shoes and Socks Off – Tork Sport
body:
It’s been nearly two years since **Shoes and Socks Off**, aka one Toby Hayes, released a full-length record.

And so it’s very, very (very) pleasing to announce that on May 14th, _**Miles Of Mad Water**_ will be available via both [Big Scary Monsters](http://bsmrocks.com/main.html "YOU BUY IT") and [Father Figure Records.](http://fatherfigurerecords.bigcartel.com/product/shoes-and-socks-off-miles-of-mad-water-pre-order "Him out of Mimas and Dad Rocks! ")

Lead single _Tork Sport_ brings Hayes’ oft-professed (but not so often easily heard) Radiohead influences to the fore, its skittering beats and gorgeous swells overlaid by the man’s characteristic oblique/tender lyrical tradeoffs. The track’s an obvious departure from 2010’s six-string-centric (and fecking badass) **_Robin Hood Waiter Champion_**, but Hayes has never been one to toe the line, and what the rest of the record’s going to be like is just freakin’ killing me.

[Put your hands together for the positive recluse.](http://shoesandsocksoff.tumblr.com/ "Get your rocks off, honey")
